sentence.text: More importantly, overexpression of mitochondrial translational elongation-L could increase tumorigenic potential of regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance-depleted cancer cells, likely indicating that hnRNPK mediates tumorigenesis through splicing regulation of MRPL33 pre-mRNA.

entity.text: regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance

sentence.text: Finally, we found that inclusion of mitochondrial translational elongation exon 3 was promoted in human colorectal cancer tissues and this was correlated with regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance levels.

entity.text: regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance

sentence.text: In summary, our findings underscore the biological significance of mitochondrial translational elongation-L and regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance in the tumor formation and identifies hnRNPK as a critical splicing regulator of MRPL33 pre-mRNA in cancer cells

entity.text: regulation of low-density lipoprotein particle clearance
